item.title: Mage help
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

if i leave it with 1 { on the end i get these errors

[code]client.java:2388: illegal start of expression
if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 4) == fal
se) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 4) == false) || playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2) ==
fasle))

   ^

client.java:2392: ‘else’ without ‘if’
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == true) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 4) ==
true) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 4) == true) || playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)
== true))
^
client.java:2392: illegal start of expression
else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == true) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 4) ==
true) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 4) == true) || playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)
== true))

    ^

client.java:2408: ‘else’ without ‘if’
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 85)
^
4 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Mage help
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

if(spellID == 12975) // smoke barrage (lvl 86 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 86) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 4) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 4) == false) || playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2) == fasle)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4) == true) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 4) == true) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 4) == true) || playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2) == true)) { startAnimation(1979); hitDiff = misc.random(26); castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 25; sendMessage("You poison the enemy."); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; deleteItem(560,getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(554,getItemSlot(554), 4); deleteItem(556,getItemSlot(556), 4); deleteItem(4278,getItemSlot(4278), 2); } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 85) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 86 to cast this spell."); } } }

that is causing my server to error 100 times with the “class, interface or enum expected” error.
can anyoen post a solution or a fix for my problem?

Read full topic
